name: RiskCube
long_description: RiskCube is software for insurance brokers and agents with a dedicated focus on property & casualty risks. We start with risk software for business property to help brokers generate more revenue and stay competitive. Our AI-powered automation platform streamlines operations by automating data entry, compliance, quoting, and policy management. This reduces contract processing from weeks to days, allowing brokers to focus on their business and clients rather than backend operations.
one_liner: We help insurance broker & agents scale their business with AI.
